thread.title: Senate Wrestles with Cyber Threat Info Sharing Bill

title: Senate Wrestles with Cyber Threat Info Sharing Bill
text:
22 Senate Wrestles with Cyber Threat Info Sharing Bill 
Gov Info Security: As the Senate continues to wrestle with the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015, with a vote expected next week, opposition to the bill from some privacy groups and major technology firms, including Apple, is heating up.
